properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 2:28PM AKST until February 19 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks AK
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Plan on difficult travel conditions. Total
snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches are expected.

* WHERE...Upper Koyukuk Valley.

* WHEN...Noon Monday to midnight Tuesday night.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Look for reduced visibilities at times.
Cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero will cause frostbite
in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause travel difficulties. The latest road conditions can be
obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON MONDAY TO MIDNIGHT AKST TUESDAY NIGHT... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
